Bosses.Name: Einhander
Bosses.TLDR:
Attack small ceruleum tanks to move them away from the boss.

If the boss pulls the group in to its location, move out as fast as possible.

Ceruleum Tanks
	Auxiliary (small) and Main (big) ceruleum tanks will drop around the arena.
	Small tanks can be attacked to knock them across the arena - do this to move all tanks away from the boss.
	Tanks will eventually begin to glow, indicating that they are about to explode - at this point they can no longer be moved and players should avoid them.

KeyMechanics.Name: Resounding Screech
KeyMechanics.Description:
Summons a group of kin carrying bombs for large scale AOE damage

The first time, the bombs will be dropped and Mark XLI Quick-Firing Cannon will ignite the first two, stand to one side of the arena away from the two bombs while these two explode, the remaining will then be ignited at which point move to the very edge where one of the first two bombs was.

The following times the bombs will be dropped with some missing and ignited with Mark XLI Quick-Firing Cannon which will be a raidwide AOE originating in the centre igniting all bombs at once, move to the edge where the missing bombs are to avoid the AOE

KeyMechanics.Name: Mark XLI Quick-Firing Cannon
KeyMechanics.Description:
This attack is a straight line AOE through the centre of the arena the first time.
Following this it is a raidwide AOE causing more damage closer to the centre of the arena.
Used to ignite Bombs from Resounding Screech.

KeyMechanics.Name: Heavy Swing
KeyMechanics.Description: This attack is a tank targetted cleave - tanks should keep the boss facing away from players at all time.

Bosses.Name: Magitek Gunship
Bosses.TLDR:
Tanks should keep the boss facing away at all times and be sure to not run back into the Flamethrower too early.

If targeted by an orange marker, bait the boss along the edge of the arena so that it drops its fire AoEs out of the way of others.

KeyMechanics.Name: Flamethrower
KeyMechanics.Description: This attack hits directly in front of the boss in a large cone and is continuous for a few seconds - tanks should keep the boss facing away from the group AND be sure not to run back into the attack too soon.

KeyMechanics.Name: Garlean Fire
KeyMechanics.Description:
The boss will fly down the centre of the arena the first time while dropping large fire puddle AoEs which disappear after a couple of seconds.
Subsequent uses he can also turn do another run along the edge after going down the centre.

KeyMechanics.Name: Cohort Vanguard
KeyMechanics.Description: These enemies will spawn during the fight and should be picked up and killed as quickly as possible.

KeyMechanics.Name: Carpet Bomb
KeyMechanics.Description: Targetted AOE on a random player

Bosses.Name: Midgardsormr
Bosses.TLDR:
Tanks should tank the orange Mirage Dragon far away from the boss, while tanking the blue Mirage Dragon as close to the boss as possible.

Players need to activate the magitek shield generator to avoid being hit for heavy damage during Animadversion - tanks be sure to keep dragon adds facing away so that they do not interrupt the activation.

KeyMechanics.Name: Admonishment
KeyMechanics.Description: This is a large column AOE down the center of the arena which can be avoided

KeyMechanics.Name: Turmoil
KeyMechanics.Description:
Observe the name of the cast to determine where to stand.

Inner Turmoil
	This attack hits the inner half (closest to the boss) with an AoE - avoid as necessary.

Outer Turmoil
	This attack hits the outer area of the arena in a large half donut - stand within melee range to avoid damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Phantom Kin
KeyMechanics.Description: One dragons gets summoned to each side of the arena, pay attention to which direction they are facing and pick a location where there is a gap in their gaze, the boss will then do one of his other abilities with "Phantom" in front (ie. Phantom Admonishment), when this ability casts the two dragons will do a straight line AOE across the arena each that takes up about 1/3 of the arena each. It is an AOE with a short period between marking and attack so make sure to pay attention to their gaze and the follow-up cast used to pre-position safely.

KeyMechanics.Name: Mirage Dragons
KeyMechanics.Description: The boss will summon two Mirage Dragons in the middle of the arena which both need to be killed quickly, the higher Midgardsormr's Aether the more damage the following Animadversion will do, reaching 100 is instant wipe.

KeyMechanics.Name: Akh Morn
KeyMechanics.Description: Targets a random player indicated by a Stack Marker which all players should stack on to distribute the damage, will hit once, followed by a short pause, this then hits 3 more times in quick succession and players should not move from the stack until all have hit.

KeyMechanics.Name: Antipathy
KeyMechanics.Description:
This attack places a circular AoE in the centre of the arena which then grows in rings over time before detonating in the same order they were placed.
Players should stand in the second ring just at the edge of the first and move into the position of the first as soon as it detonates to avoid being hit by the second ring.

KeyMechanics.Name: Condescension
KeyMechanics.Description: Targetted AOE on the tank with no area marker hitting for minor damage if only a single target is hit. Tank should move away from players
